constituent: national flag, banner, compass, direction reclining, lying down, bushel basket, hamper, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: The national flag of Croatia. It's a banner with the Croatian coat of arms, commonly referred to as the Chessboard (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coat_of_arms_of_Croatia).
koohiiStory2: The national flag is the banner of a country; stored in a whicker basket at night and taken out to the flagpole in the morning.
